full_text: A new €10.5m BAI fund for TV/Radio will support  🟢climate change awareness 🟢Irish language broadcasting 🟢live music productions  @EamonRyan & I made the announcement today -€5m goes towards climate change awareness. Huge congrats to Ireland's @graftonarchs who have won the 2022 EU Prize for Contemporary Architecture 🙌  Yvonne Farrell and Shelley McNamara were recognised for creating a work of remarkable environmental quality as well as an emotional connection from within. Great to be at #ITICConf22 today to meet industry partners  Lots of positivity in the room as we look towards a strong recovery this year  Sustainability & competitiveness are the conference themes and they're central to my goal of making Ireland a leader in sustainable tourism. https://t.co/7pZLxygUhg

Tomorrow the first meeting of the Citizens' Assembly on Biodiversity Loss takes place.  We have seen how Citizens' Assemblies can lead the way on many issues, we now need this leadership and unity in tackling the biodiversity crisis. https://t.co/uyz10201DY

Very sorry to hear that Stillorgan resident Oleksandr Zavhorodniy has been killed in Ukraine defending his country  He was a much loved member of his community in Stillorgan & Sandyford where he worked  My thoughts are with all his family and friends   Ireland stands with Ukraine https://t.co/0hDbazamZV https://t.co/P0jlHRJT5m

#CreativeSchools launched today at Stanhope St Primary School, Dublin 🙌  €2.5m has been allocated  Successful schools receive 🟢funding 🟢training 🟢specialist support from a Creative Associate  to help young people build on their creative skills🎨🎭🎶  https://t.co/5U8zMZrTKP https://t.co/rj0gM4MuF3

Thank you President @ZelenskyyUa for your historic address to the Oireachtas  Our hearts are with the people of Ukraine whose lives have been devastated by the Russian invasion  Ireland demands accountability for the horror inflicted on your country. Ireland stands with Ukraine.

The basic income for the arts pilot launched today will pay 2,000 artists and arts workers €325 weekly for three years.  This is all part of a research project to inform how a more long-term and widespread basic income for the arts would work.  https://t.co/EQc2TKkAqG https://t.co/A14Vbpd5GN

Basic Income for the Arts pilot📢  2,000 artists & creative arts workers will receive €325 per week  Applications open: Apr 12th  Eligible recipients will be selected at random  This unprecedented commitment heralds a new era for the arts in Ireland  https://t.co/EQc2TKkAqG https://t.co/q5kmYxuADC

@otkachenkoua @EUCouncil @DeptCulturelRL @dfatirl We discussed ensuring Ukrainian cultural heritage survives this horrific war, protecting media freedom & fighting disinformation.  Ireland supports making all possible EU cultural programmes available to Ukrainians

In Ireland, only 23% of Dáil seats are currently held by women.  The Electoral Reform Bill launched this week works to make our councils & Houses of the Oireachtas more representative of the people of Ireland and see more #WomenInPolitics  Well done @noonan_malcolm  #MoreWomen https://t.co/DUxAwLrhgB

In working through these recommendations and actions, we recognise that there is a need for change at a systemic level.  I am 100% committed to enacting all of the recommendations that arose out of the report.

Argentina was one of the 1st countries in the world to acknowledge the independence of the fledgling independent Irish State  This week I experienced the warmest welcome and I learned about the depth of our shared culture   Gracias, espero puedes visitar a Irelanda pronto! ❤️🇦🇷☘️ https://t.co/exSdm194US

Irishness is not defined by where we live but it's based on a shared culture  Great to visit The Hurling Club in Buenos Aires, it's the largest Argentine-Irish Association in Argentina with 1,400 members and celebrates its 100th year this year🎊🎉🇮🇪🇦🇷 https://t.co/S3PE2C14Xk

Great to meet Deputy Foreign Minister, Pablo Tettamanti, today in Buenos Aires.  Our new Latin American and Caribbean Strategy aims to increase our collaboration. We discussed ways to deepen and enhance our relationship. https://t.co/NOIPqG2jOv

Great to experience our shared culture expressed in the exhibition Cien Años de Amistad | 100 Years of Friendship  I was honoured to receive a book on Admiral Brown, a Mayoman who became the father of the Argentine navy.  @Armada_Arg https://t.co/xBNkX9cePu

At #Rabieta today, home of #Guinness in Argentina.   This is the first time that Guinness is produced locally in South America, I wish them great success.   Big thanks to Miguel & team for hosting us and sharing the secrets behind the hops. https://t.co/VCPa9Hy2uN

Argentina's National Library has an extraordinary Irish collection  Great to visit it today for the launch of the Spanish edition of Professor Dermot Keogh's book, Ireland and Argentina in the 20th Century. https://t.co/DQVyVZnyZH

We condemn the Russian Federation’s unprovoked military aggression against Ukraine and we demand that Russia immediately ceases its military actions. https://t.co/V8EiSuZckU

My fellow European Ministers for Culture, Audiovisual & Media and I express our solidarity with Ukraine and our support for artists, journalists & cultural professionals, who, because of Russian military aggression, are now threatened in their freedoms.
